pros:

job_title: Multi Sports Coach in Bristol, England
pros: Fun and active , great compliment to teaching or sports degree
cons:
Lower pay
Long hours / 10 hrs a day

review_title: Good, but limited room for creative thinking
pros: Fun, active and fast paced. Lots of different activities with kids at different ages and coaches from all kinds of background.
cons: Long hours, system is very set in their ways and doesn’t allow coaches to be creative and listen to the kids wants. Felt very limited and controlled at times.

job_title: KS1 Sports Coach in Bakewell, England
pros: Fun Exciting Rewards Fast Paced Everyday Different
cons: Long Days sometimes, Confusing Hours before starting.
